title: Diablo is done for (NP)
creator_credit: Calypso Films, Dept Health and Community Services, Denise Patience and Esben Storm
brief_description: This is a drama about child sexual abuse. All is not right at Ray’s home where he is no longer able to tolerate his father’s sexual abuse of his young brother Mikey. With the support of his friends and teacher, Ray finally takes a stand against his father. This is a non-explicit film about child sexual abuse suitable for secondary students.
